wikipedia_page.main: James Daniel Gallagher  CB FRSE is a Scottish civil servant. He was Director General of devolution for the United Kingdom's Ministry of Justice from 2007 until 2010, and served as Secretary to the Commission on Scottish Devolution. He joined Better Together in January 2014 as a strategy advisor.He was appointed a Companion of the Order of the Bath (CB) in the 2005 Birthday Honours.

*Jim Gallagher (civil servant), Scottish civil servant and professor

Professor Jim Gallagher, the civil servant who drafted the Bill, was appointed to advise the Scotland Bill Committee of the Scottish Parliament, convened by Wendy Alexander, whose parliamentary motion started the whole Calman process.
